items.sentence: I honestly think it's better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate.
Putting on a mask when I leave the house now feels as normal as putting on my seatbelt when I get into my car.
We are haunted by an ideal life, and it is because we have within us the beginning and the possibility for it.
In three days you get tired of a beautiful woman while in the same amount of time you get used to an ugly one.
I would like to stress that it is more convenient to control tariffs as a bloc rather than country by country.
